aom.scripting.ui.console

Class Gadget

  • Object
    • Gadget

  • public class Gadget
extends Object
    This class provides a collection of Console commands concerning Gadgets. Gadgets are the building blocks for UIs.
    Local Call
    Gadget commands are all local.
    Author
    Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com

      Methods

      Turns gadget flashing on/off.

      Shows the requested gadget.

      Shows the requested gadget if the game made is not multiplayer.

      Acts like the current cycle gadget has been pressed.

      Cycles through the active child gadget of a deluxe gadget.
